segments.text: Looking at this drawing, I notice the tidy garden outside the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It contrasts so much with the chaos inside the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is polishing that plate, totally oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water from the faucet is running nonstop, filling the sink to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why hasn't she turned it off? It's flooding the floor!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress and apron are getting soaked without her knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids, climbing on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is grabbing cookies like he owns the place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's just waiting there, encouraging him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole setup screams trouble waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe no one's noticing the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting water damage right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a careless scene this is.
segments.speaker: PAR
